pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, December 15, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of the Northwest Territories, Caroline Cochrane.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

4:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an early learning and child care announcement with Premier of the Northwest Territories Caroline Cochrane, Minister of Families, Children and Social Development Karina Gould, Minister of Northern Affairs Dan Vandal, and Member of Parliament for Northwest Territories Michael McLeod. Northwest Territories Minister of Education, Culture and Employment R. J. Simpson will join the announcement virtually. A media availability will follow.

National Arts Centre
1 Elgin Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Journalists wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Media can email media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca to register for this event.
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 4:00 p.m.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 3053484#
